00250 // This virtual function is called once before the first call to paintGL() or resizeGL(),

00254 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 void StatsVisualization::initializeGL()
00256 {
00257 
00258    glClearColor(0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f, 1.0f);         // Grey Background
00259    // enable depth testing for drawing
00260    glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00261 
00262    glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00263 
00264    // Now we will create a basic Camera from the graphics library
00265    // This is a static camera so it only needs to be set once
00266    // First create Values for the camera position
00267 
00268    ngl::Vec3 from(0,0.2,50);
00269    ngl::Vec3 to(0,0,0);
00270    ngl::Vec3 up(0,1,0);
00271 
00272    m_cam= new ngl::Camera(from,to,up,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00273    // set the shape using FOV 45 Aspect Ratio based on Width and Height
00274    // The final two are near and far clipping planes of 0.5 and 10
00275    m_cam->setShape(45,(float)640/480,0.001,150,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00276 
00277 
00278 
00279 
00280 
00281    ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00282    #ifdef WIN32
00283     glewInit();
00284    #endif
00285    Init->initGlew();
00286 
00287    // we create 2 shaders, one for 3D rendering, another one for 2D quad pasting
00288 
00289    //PER FRAGMENT ASD SHADER FOR 3D RENDER
00290 
00291    // now to load the shader and set the values
00292    // grab an instance of shader manager
00293 
00294    ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00295    //shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00296    // we are creating a shader called PerFragADS
00297    shader->createShaderProgram("PerFragADS");
00298    // now we are going to create empty shaders for Frag and Vert
00299    shader->attachShader("PerFragADSVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00300    shader->attachShader("PerFragADSFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00301    // attach the source
00302    shader->loadShaderSource("PerFragADSVertex","shaders/PerFragASDVert.glsl");
00303    shader->loadShaderSource("PerFragADSFragment","shaders/PerFragASDFrag.glsl");
00304    // compile the shaders
00305    shader->compileShader("PerFragADSVertex");
00306    shader->compileShader("PerFragADSFragment");
00307    // add them to the program
00308    shader->attachShaderToProgram("PerFragADS","PerFragADSVertex");
00309    shader->attachShaderToProgram("PerFragADS","PerFragADSFragment");
00310 
00311    // now we have associated this data we can link the shader
00312    shader->linkProgramObject("PerFragADS");
00313    // and make it active ready to load values
00314    (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
00315    // now we need to set the material and light values
00316    /*
00317     *struct MaterialInfo
00318     {
00319          // Ambient reflectivity
00320          vec3 Ka;
00321          // Diffuse reflectivity
00322          vec3 Kd;
00323          // Specular reflectivity
00324          vec3 Ks;
00325          // Specular shininess factor
00326          float shininess;
00327    };*/
00328    shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Ka",0.1,0.1,0.1);
00329    // green diffuse
00330    shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.8,0.0);
00331    // white spec
00332    shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Ks",1.0,1.0,1.0);
00333    shader->setShaderParam1f("material.shininess",100);
00334    // now for  the lights values (all set to white)
00335    /*struct LightInfo
00336    {
00337    // Light position in eye coords.
00338    vec4 position;
00339    // Ambient light intensity
00340    vec3 La;
00341    // Diffuse light intensity
00342    vec3 Ld;
00343    // Specular light intensity
00344    vec3 Ls;
00345    };*/
00346    shader->setUniform("light.position",m_lightPos);
00347    shader->setShaderParam3f("light.La",0.1,0.1,0.1);
00348    shader->setShaderParam3f("light.Ld",1.0,1.0,1.0);
00349    shader->setShaderParam3f("light.Ls",0.9,0.9,0.9);
00350 
00351 
00352 
00353    // TEXTURE SHADER INSTANCE FOR 2D
00354 
00355      // now shader for Texture Pasting used for 2D viz.
00356      shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00357      shader->createShaderProgram("TextureShaderStats");
00358 
00359      shader->attachShader("TextureVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00360      shader->attachShader("TextureFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00361      shader->loadShaderSource("TextureVertex","shaders/TextureVert.glsl");
00362      shader->loadShaderSource("TextureFragment","shaders/TextureFrag.glsl");
00363 
00364      shader->compileShader("TextureVertex");
00365      shader->compileShader("TextureFragment");
00366      shader->attachShaderToProgram("TextureShaderStats","TextureVertex");
00367      shader->attachShaderToProgram("TextureShaderStats","TextureFragment");
00368 
00369      shader->linkProgramObject("TextureShaderStats");
00370      (*shader)["TextureShaderStats"]->use();
00371      shader->setShaderParam1i("tex",0);
00372 
00373      m_2DScreen = new ScreenQuad(640,480,"TextureShaderStats");
00374 
00375      ngl::Texture crowdTexture("textures/crowd.png");
00376      ngl::Texture tableTexture("textures/blue_ultramarine.png");
00377 
00378      ngl::Texture speedLegendTexture("textures/speedlegendbold.png");
00379      ngl::Texture rpmLegendTexture("textures/rpslegend.png");
00380      ngl::Texture trajectoryLegendTexture("textures/traj_map.png");
00381      ngl::Texture htMapLegendTexture("textures/height_map.png");
00382      ngl::Texture htGridMapLegendTexture("textures/grid.png");
00383 
00384      m_crowdTextureName = crowdTexture.setTextureGL();
00385      m_tableTextureName = tableTexture.setTextureGL();
00386 
00387      m_speedLegend = speedLegendTexture.setTextureGL();
00388      m_rpmLegend = rpmLegendTexture.setTextureGL();
00389      m_trajectoryLegend = trajectoryLegendTexture.setTextureGL();
00390      m_heightMapLegend = htMapLegendTexture.setTextureGL();
00391      m_gridXYHtMap = htGridMapLegendTexture.setTextureGL();
00392 
00393      //frame rate GUNDU
00394      m_text=new ngl::Text(QFont("Arial",25));
00395      m_text->setColour(1,1,1);
00396      //m_text->setScreenSize(640,480);
00397 
00398      //     m_text1=new ngl::Text(QFont("Arial",25));
00399      //     m_text1->setColour(1,1,1);
00400      //     m_text1->setScreenSize(640,480);
00401 
00402      m_updateTimer = startTimer(3);
00403 
00404 }

00409 void StatsVisualization::resizeGL(
00410                         int _w,
00411                         int _h
00412                        )
00413 {
00414     //glViewport(0,0,_w,_h);
00415 
00416     m_legendWidth = _w * (200/640.0);

00418     //m_cam->setShape(45,(float)_w/_h,0.001,150,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);

00421 // change this name to ads shader
00422 void StatsVisualization::loadMatricesToADSShader()
00423 {
00424   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00425   //(*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
00426 
00427   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00428   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00429   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00430   ngl::Mat4 M;
00431   M=m_transformStack.getCurrentTransform().getMatrix();
00432   MV= m_transformStack.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix()*m_cam->getViewMatrix();
00433   MVP=MV*m_cam->getProjectionMatrix() ;
00434   normalMatrix=MV;
00435   normalMatrix.inverse();
00436   shader->setUniform("MVP",MVP);
00437   shader->setUniform("MV",MV);
00438   shader->setUniform("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00439   shader->setUniform("light.position",m_lightPos);
00440 
00441 }
00442 
00443 void StatsVisualization::loadMatricesToTextureShader()
00444 {
00445   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00446   //(*shader)["TextureShaderStats"]->use();
00447 
00448   ngl::Mat4 MVP=m_transformStack.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix()*m_cam->getVPMatrix();
00449 
00450   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00451   shader->setUniform("textureFlag",true);
00452 
00453 
00454 
00455 }
00456 
00457 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00458 //This virtual function is called whenever the widget needs to be painted.
00459 // this is our main drawing routine
00460 void StatsVisualization::paintGL()
00461 {
00462 
00463 
00464   //UPDATETIMER does not call PAINTGL
00465   //JUST CALLS ONCE finally WHEN FIELD VALUES ARE COMPUTED and kills the timer
00466 
00467   // clear the screen and depth buffer
00468   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00469 
00470   //glViewport(0,0,640,480);
00471 
00472   // only when 3D data is requested..
00473   if(m_3dFlag)
00474   {
00475     // Rotation based on the mouse position for our global transform
00476     ngl::Transformation trans;
00477     ngl::Mat4 rotX;
00478     ngl::Mat4 rotY;
00479     // create the rotation matrices
00480     rotX.rotateX(m_spinXFace);
00481     rotY.rotateY(m_spinYFace);
00482     // multiply the rotations
00483     ngl::Mat4 final=rotY*rotX;
00484     // add the translations
00485     final.m_m[3][0] = m_modelPos.m_x;
00486     final.m_m[3][1] = m_modelPos.m_y;
00487     final.m_m[3][2] = m_modelPos.m_z;
00488     // set this in the TX stack
00489     trans.setMatrix(final);
00490     m_transformStack.setGlobal(trans);
00491     //loadMatricesToADSShader();
00492 
00493     // if we were previously seeing a 2D stats
00494     // window it would have been restricted to 640*480
00495     // so we need to resize our opengl window
00496     // to render to the current window size for 3D stats
00497     glViewport(0,0,this->size().width(),this->size().height());
00498     // this resize is called to resize the ratio of the legend window
00499     // which will be displayed in 3d stats
00500     resizeGL(this->size().width(),this->size().height());
00501 
00502   }
00503   else
00504   {
00505     // for 2D stats the gl window can only be 640*480
00506     glViewport(0,0,640,480);
00507     m_text->setScreenSize(640,480);
00508     resizeGL(640,480);
00509 
00510   }
00511 
00512 
00513   drawEntireScene();
00514 
00515 }
00516 
00517 void StatsVisualization::drawEntireScene()
00518 {
00519 
00520     cv::Mat drawing = cv::Mat::zeros(480,640,CV_8UC3 );
00521 
00522     if((m_width != 0) && (m_height != 0))
00523     {
00524 
00525         cv::rectangle(drawing,m_fieldOfPlay,cv::Scalar(92,163,69),-1);
00526 
00527         cv::line(drawing,cv::Point(m_midTopX,m_midTopY),cv::Point(m_midBottomX,m_midBottomY),cv::Scalar(255,0,0),1);
00528 
00529         cv::line(drawing,cv::Point(m_midLeftX,m_midLeftY),cv::Point(m_midRightX,m_midRightY),cv::Scalar(233,235,226),3);
00530 
00531 
00532         // Note for All following Switch cases and Statistics:
00533 
00534         // if data has been processed by the processing utility
00535         // then call a local function which will call playerallrallies function
00536         // store in player specific array and draw it if not empty
00537 
00538         // if impact pts have already been filled, then this will avoid
00539         // further calling of functions..saves time and calculations
00540         // same logic applies for all statistics
00541 
00542         switch (m_whichStat)
00543         {
00544           case IMPACT_POINTS_VIEW:
00545           {
00546             //m_3dFlag = 0;
00547 
00548             if(!(m_impactPtsFilled))
00549             {
00550               if(m_playerA->checkDataProcessed() && m_playerB->checkDataProcessed())
00551               {
00552                   fillAllImpactPointsBothPlayers();
00553               }
00554             }
00555 
00556             switch(m_whichPlayer)
00557             {
00558               case PLAYERA:
00559               {
00560                 if(m_playerAImpactData.size() != 0)
00561                 {
00562                     for(int i=0;i<m_playerAImpactData.size();i++)
00563                     {
00564                         cv::circle(drawing,m_playerAImpactData[i],8,cv::Scalar(255,255,255),-1);
00565                     }
00566                 }
00567                 break;
00568               }
00569 
00570               case PLAYERB:
00571               {
00572                 if(m_playerBImpactData.size() != 0)
00573                 {
00574                     for(int i=0;i<m_playerBImpactData.size();i++)
00575                     {
00576                         cv::circle(drawing,m_playerBImpactData[i],8,cv::Scalar(255,0,0),-1);
00577                     }
00578                 }
00579                 break;
00580               }
00581               case BOTH:
00582               {
00583                 if(m_playerAImpactData.size() != 0)
00584                 {
00585                     for(int i=0;i<m_playerAImpactData.size();i++)
00586                     {
00587                         cv::circle(drawing,m_playerAImpactData[i],8,cv::Scalar(255,255,255),-1);
00588                     }
00589                 }
00590 
00591                 if(m_playerBImpactData.size() != 0)
00592                 {
00593                     for(int i=0;i<m_playerBImpactData.size();i++)
00594                     {
00595                         cv::circle(drawing,m_playerBImpactData[i],8,cv::Scalar(255,0,0),-1);
00596                     }
00597                 }
00598 
00599                 break;
00600               }
00601 
00602             }
00603             break;
00604           }
00605 
00606           case IMPACT_PERCENTAGE_DISTRIBUTION_VIEW:
00607           {
00608             // pecentage distrbn
00609             // to stop recalculating in every paintgl, we check against -1
00610 
00611             // THESE SWITCH CASES MIGHT ONLY BE USEFUL WHEN IT IS RENDERED APO-APO
00612             //  LIKE THE IMPACT DRAWING BUFFER...WE NEED TO FIND A WAY FOR THIS

00907           case IMPACT_HEIGHT_MAP_VIEW:
00908           {
00909 
00910 
00911             //hegith map
00912             m_cam->setEye(ngl::Vec4(0,3.0,55,1));
00913 
00914             if(!(m_impactPtsFilled))
00915             {
00916               if(m_playerA->checkDataProcessed() && m_playerB->checkDataProcessed())
00917               {
00918                   fillAllImpactPointsBothPlayers();
00919               }
00920             }
00921 
00922             if(!(m_vao) && (m_impactPtsFilled == true))
00923             {
00924                 buildPointGraphBars();
00925             }
00926 
00927 
00928             ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00929             switch(m_whichPlayer)
00930             {
00931 
00932               case PLAYERA:
00933               {
00934                   // in this case we are going to set our data as the vertices above
00935 
00936                   if(m_vao)
00937                   {
00938 
00939                       drawCrowd("heightMapPlane");
00940                       drawTable("heightMapPlane");
00941 
00942                       // draw the bounding graph planes
00943                       drawContainingGridScaleXY();
00944 
00945                       (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
00946                       shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.5,0.5,0.5);
00947 
00948                       m_transformStack.pushTransform();
00949                       {
00950                         // next we bind it so it's active for setting data
00951                         m_vao->bind();
00952                         m_vao->setData(m_dataVertsA.size()*sizeof(VertData),m_dataVertsA[0].nx);
00953 
00954                         //sizeof(vertData) and the offset into the data structure for the first x component is 3 (nx,ny,nz)..x
00955                         m_vao->setVertexAttributePointer(0,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(VertData),3);
00956                         // uv same as above but starts at 0 and is attrib 1 and only u,v so 2
00957                         // normal same as vertex only starts at position 0
00958                         m_vao->setVertexAttributePointer(2,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(VertData),0);
00959                         m_vao->setNumIndices(m_dataVertsA.size());
00960 
00961                         loadMatricesToADSShader();
00962 
00963                         m_vao->draw();
00964                         // finally we have finished for now so time to unbind the VAO
00965                         m_vao->unbind();
00966                        }
00967                       m_transformStack.popTransform();
00968                    }
00969                   break;
00970                 }
00971 
00972               case PLAYERB:
00973               {
00974                       // in this case we are going to set our data as the vertices above
00975                   if(m_vao)
00976                   {
00977                       drawCrowd("heightMapPlane");
00978                       drawTable("heightMapPlane");
00979                       // draw the bounding graph planes
00980                       drawContainingGridScaleXY();
00981 
00982                       (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
00983                       shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.8,0.0,0.0);
00984 
00985                       m_transformStack.pushTransform();
00986                       {
00987                         // next we bind it so it's active for setting data
00988                         m_vao->bind();
00989 
00990                         m_vao->setData(m_dataVertsB.size()*sizeof(VertData),m_dataVertsB[0].nx);
00991                         m_vao->setVertexAttributePointer(0,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(VertData),3);
00992                         // normal same as vertex only starts at position 0
00993                         m_vao->setVertexAttributePointer(2,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(VertData),0);
00994                         m_vao->setNumIndices(m_dataVertsB.size());
00995                         loadMatricesToADSShader();
00996                         m_vao->draw();
00997                         // finally we have finished for now so time to unbind the VAO
00998                         m_vao->unbind();
00999                       }
01000                       m_transformStack.popTransform();
01001                    }

01084                     {

01087                             continue;
01088                         }

01090                         {

01093                                                          m_playerATrajectoryFromFile[j+2]);

01314                             m_transformStack.setPosition(m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D[i].x,
01315                                                          m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D[i].y,
01316                                                          m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D[i].z);
01317 
01318 
01319 
01320                             setColorBasedOnRPMRange(m_playerARPM[i]);
01321                             loadMatricesToADSShader();
01322                             //(*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01323 
01324                             prim->draw("rpmSphere");
01325                         }
01326                         m_transformStack.popTransform();
01327                     }
01328                 }
01329                   break;
01330               }
01331               case PLAYERB:
01332               {
01333                   if(m_playerBRPM.size() != 0)
01334                   {
01335                       for(int i=0;i<m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.size();i++)
01336                       {
01337                           m_transformStack.pushTransform();
01338                           {
01339                               m_transformStack.setPosition(m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D[i].x,
01340                                                            m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D[i].y,
01341                                                            m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D[i].z);
01342 
01343 
01344                               setColorBasedOnRPMRange(m_playerBRPM[i]);
01345                               loadMatricesToADSShader();
01346                               //(*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01347 
01348                               prim->draw("rpmSphere");
01349                           }
01350                           m_transformStack.popTransform();
01351 
01352                        }
01353                   }
01354                   break;
01355               }
01356               case BOTH:
01357               {
01358                   // not allowed, just a place holder
01359                   break;
01360               }
01361             }
01362               break;
01363           }
01364         }
01365           // or disable start tracking once process stats is clicked--easier way
01366       }
01367 
01368 
01369       if(!(m_3dFlag))
01370       {
01371 
01372         m_transformStack.pushTransform();
01373         {
01374             m_2DScreen->draw(&drawing);
01375         }
01376         m_transformStack.popTransform();
01377 
01378         // this ngl text rendering should
01379         // have been placed along with the multiple switch cases
01380         // above, but for some reason ngl text was not rendering
01381         // when placed there, probably because of opencv buffer
01382         // rendering and shader switch....
01383         // so we first draw the texture shader buffer and then finally render the percentages
01384         // in a seperate module renderPercentages()
01385         if(m_whichStat == IMPACT_PERCENTAGE_DISTRIBUTION_VIEW)
01386         {
01387             renderPercentages();
01388         }
01389         else
01390         {
01391             // other stats do not rely on text rendering,so
01392             // do nothing
01393         }
01394       }
01395       else
01396       {
01397 
01398 
01399 
01400         // 3D drawing, taken care in multiple switch cases in place,so
01401         // do nothing other than drawing the appropriate net lines
01402           //loadMatricesToADSShader();
01403 
01404 
01405           ngl::VertexArrayObject *vao= ngl::VertexArrayObject::createVOA(GL_LINES);
01406           ngl::Vec3 points[2];
01407 
01408 
01409           m_transformStack.pushTransform();
01410           {
01411             // middle net line representaion for ht map
01412             if(m_whichStat == IMPACT_HEIGHT_MAP_VIEW)
01413             {
01414 
01415                 //draw line
01416                 vao->bind();
01417                 points[0].m_x=0;
01418                 points[0].m_y=0.2;
01419                 points[0].m_z=m_fieldOfPlay.height/20.0;
01420                 points[1].m_x= 0;
01421                 points[1].m_y= 0.2;
01422                 points[1].m_z= -(m_fieldOfPlay.height/20.0);
01423 
01424                 vao->setData(2*sizeof(ngl::Vec3),points[0].m_x);
01425                 vao->setVertexAttributePointer(0,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(ngl::Vec3),0);
01426                 vao->setNumIndices(2);
01427                 ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
01428                 (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01429                 shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.0,0.0);
01430                 loadMatricesToADSShader();
01431                 vao->draw();
01432                 vao->removeVOA();
01433 
01434                 legendWindow(m_heightMapLegend);
01435 
01436             }
01437             // middle net line representaion for trajectory
01438             else if(m_whichStat == TRAJECTORY_VIEW)
01439             {
01440                 //draw line
01441                 vao->bind();
01442                 points[0].m_x=0;
01443                 points[0].m_y=0.005;
01444                 points[0].m_z=m_finalCourtDepthWorld/2;
01445                 points[1].m_x= 0;
01446                 points[1].m_y= 0.005;
01447                 points[1].m_z= -(m_finalCourtDepthWorld/2);
01448 
01449                 vao->setData(2*sizeof(ngl::Vec3),points[0].m_x);
01450                 vao->setVertexAttributePointer(0,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(ngl::Vec3),0);
01451                 vao->setNumIndices(2);
01452                 ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
01453                 (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01454                 shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.0,0.0);
01455                 loadMatricesToADSShader();
01456                 vao->draw();
01457                 vao->removeVOA();
01458 
01459                 legendWindow(m_trajectoryLegend);
01460             }
01461             // for speed and rpm stats same scale is maintained
01462             else if(m_whichStat == VELOCITY_VIEW)
01463             {
01464 
01465                 //draw line
01466                 vao->bind();
01467                 points[0].m_x=0;
01468                 points[0].m_y=0;
01469                 points[0].m_z=(m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10)/2;
01470                 points[1].m_x= 0;
01471                 points[1].m_y= 0;
01472                 points[1].m_z= -((m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10)/2);
01473 
01474                 vao->setData(2*sizeof(ngl::Vec3),points[0].m_x);
01475                 vao->setVertexAttributePointer(0,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(ngl::Vec3),0);
01476                 vao->setNumIndices(2);
01477                 ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
01478                 (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01479                 shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.0,0.0);
01480                 loadMatricesToADSShader();
01481                 vao->draw();
01482                 vao->removeVOA();
01483 
01484 
01485                 legendWindow(m_speedLegend);
01486 
01487             }
01488 
01489             else if(m_whichStat == RPM_VIEW)
01490             {
01491 
01492                 //draw line
01493                 vao->bind();
01494                 points[0].m_x=0;
01495                 points[0].m_y=0;
01496                 points[0].m_z=(m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10)/2;
01497                 points[1].m_x= 0;
01498                 points[1].m_y= 0;
01499                 points[1].m_z= -((m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10)/2);
01500 
01501                 vao->setData(2*sizeof(ngl::Vec3),points[0].m_x);
01502                 vao->setVertexAttributePointer(0,3,GL_FLOAT,sizeof(ngl::Vec3),0);
01503                 vao->setNumIndices(2);
01504                 ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
01505                 (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01506                 shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.0,0.0);
01507                 loadMatricesToADSShader();
01508                 vao->draw();
01509                 vao->removeVOA();
01510 
01511                 legendWindow(m_rpmLegend);
01512 
01513             }
01514 
01515           }
01516           m_transformStack.popTransform();
01517       }
01518 }
01519 
01520 
01521 void StatsVisualization::timerEvent(
01522                           QTimerEvent *_event
01523                          )
01524 {
01525     if(_event->timerId() == m_updateTimer)
01526     {
01527         KinectInterface *kinect=KinectInterface::instance();
01528 
01529         if(m_importFlag == false)
01530         {
01531 
01532 
01533         // when stats window is not created with import flag, it is live window
01534         // so go ahead with computation, if not fieldOfPlay and width and height
01535         // would be filled up by the parser
01536 
01537           if(kinect->getBounds())
01538           {
01539               m_fieldOfPlay = kinect->getBoxObject();
01540 
01541               m_width = m_fieldOfPlay.width;
01542               m_height = m_fieldOfPlay.height;
01543               m_midTopX = m_fieldOfPlay.x + m_width/2;
01544               m_midTopY = m_fieldOfPlay.y;
01545               m_midBottomX = m_midTopX;
01546               m_midBottomY = m_midTopY + m_height;
01547 
01548               m_midLeftX = m_fieldOfPlay.x;
01549               m_midLeftY = m_midTopY + m_height/2;
01550               m_midRightX = m_fieldOfPlay.x + m_width;
01551               m_midRightY = m_midLeftY;
01552 
01553               // we kill the timer once the bounds are calculated finally
01554               // when rt click is done
01555               killTimer(m_updateTimer);
01556           }
01557 
01558 
01559 
01560         }
01561         else if(m_importFlag)
01562         {
01563             killTimer(m_updateTimer);
01564         }
01565 
01566         updateGL();
01567     }
01568 
01569 
01570 }
01571 
01572 void StatsVisualization::processKey(
01573                                                     QKeyEvent *_event
01574                                                    )
01575 {
01576   // this method is called every time the main window recives a key event.
01577   // we then switch on the key value and set the camera in the StatsVisualization
01578  switch (_event->key())
01579   {
01580 
01581     default : break;
01582   }
01583   // finally update the StatsVisualization and re-draw
01584   updateGL();
01585 }

01605     // if process stats is clicked, then tracking has been stopped

01607     // in paintgl, so we do not have to do anything here apart from calling paintgl
01608     updateGL();
01609 }

01629     {

01638 void StatsVisualization::buildQuadSpecificData()
01639 {
01640     m_percentageABL = m_playerA->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,BOTTOM_LEFT);
01641     m_quadSpecABL = m_playerA->getQuadSpecificPoints(BOTTOM_LEFT);
01642 
01643     m_percentageATL = m_playerA->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,TOP_LEFT);
01644     m_quadSpecATL = m_playerA->getQuadSpecificPoints(TOP_LEFT);
01645 
01646     m_percentageATR = m_playerA->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,TOP_RIGHT);
01647     m_quadSpecATR = m_playerA->getQuadSpecificPoints(TOP_RIGHT);
01648 
01649     m_percentageABR = m_playerA->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,BOTTOM_RIGHT);
01650     m_quadSpecABR = m_playerA->getQuadSpecificPoints(BOTTOM_RIGHT);
01651 
01652     m_percentageBBL = m_playerB->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,BOTTOM_LEFT);
01653     m_quadSpecBBL = m_playerB->getQuadSpecificPoints(BOTTOM_LEFT);
01654 
01655     m_percentageBTL = m_playerB->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,TOP_LEFT);
01656     m_quadSpecBTL = m_playerB->getQuadSpecificPoints(TOP_LEFT);
01657 
01658     m_percentageBTR = m_playerB->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,TOP_RIGHT);
01659     m_quadSpecBTR = m_playerB->getQuadSpecificPoints(TOP_RIGHT);
01660 
01661     m_percentageBBR = m_playerB->getPercentageDistributionData(m_midTopX,m_midRightY,BOTTOM_RIGHT);
01662     m_quadSpecBBR = m_playerB->getQuadSpecificPoints(BOTTOM_RIGHT);
01663 
01664     m_quadMapBuilt = true;
01665 }

01672             (m_whichStat == VELOCITY_VIEW) || (m_whichStat == RPM_VIEW)) // add more later
01673     {
01674         m_3dFlag = true;
01675     }
01676     else
01677     {
01678         m_3dFlag = false;
01679     }
01680     updateGL();
01681 }

01711 void StatsVisualization::buildPointGraphBars()
01712 {
01713     // grid resol is set to 10 now...
01714     // make it dynamic later
01715 
01716     std::vector<cv::Point3f> aBarGraphVertices,bBarGraphVertices;
01717 
01718     aBarGraphVertices = m_playerA->getBarGraphVertices(cv::Point(m_fieldOfPlay.x,m_fieldOfPlay.y),m_fieldOfPlay.width,
01719                                                          m_fieldOfPlay.height,10);
01720 
01721     bBarGraphVertices = m_playerB->getBarGraphVertices(cv::Point(m_fieldOfPlay.x,m_fieldOfPlay.y),m_fieldOfPlay.width,
01722                                                          m_fieldOfPlay.height,10);
01723 
01724 
01725     fillDataVertsWithNormals(aBarGraphVertices,m_dataVertsA);
01726     fillDataVertsWithNormals(bBarGraphVertices,m_dataVertsB);
01727 
01728 
01729     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
01730 
01731     // we scale it down only by 10 and not by 20 as tri plane is drawn from 0,0,0
01732     // so it will stretch from 10 untis up to 10 units down
01733     // similarly for width as well from left to right
01734 
01735     prim->createTrianglePlane("heightMapPlane",m_fieldOfPlay.width/10.0,m_fieldOfPlay.height/10.0,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
01736 
01737     // create a vao as a series of GL_TRIANGLES
01738     m_vao= ngl::VertexArrayObject::createVOA(GL_TRIANGLES);
01739 
01740 
01741 }

01743 
01744 void StatsVisualization::buildTrajectory()
01745 {
01746     m_playerAInterpPtsMappedToRallies = m_playerA->getPlayerInterpolatedBallPtsAll(m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters);
01747     m_playerBInterpPtsMappedToRallies = m_playerB->getPlayerInterpolatedBallPtsAll(m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters);
01748 
01749     // conversion to world coords just to draw a static field of play
01750     // plane to be relative to the scale of the trajectories
01751     // i.e, both the field of play and the trajectories would be in Metres scale
01752 
01753     // note to self: DISPLAY the METRES SCALE on the window
01754 
01755     calculateFieldOfPlayInWorldCoords();
01756 
01757     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
01758 
01759     // no scaling... 1 unit = 1 meter
01760     prim->createTrianglePlane("trajectoryPlane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld,m_finalCourtDepthWorld,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
01761 
01762     prim->createSphere("trajectorySphere",0.004,10.0);
01763 
01764     m_trajectoryBuilt = true;
01765 
01766 
01767 
01768 }
01769 
01770 void StatsVisualization::buildSpeedMap()
01771 {
01772     m_speedAData = m_playerA->getPlayerSpeedData(m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters);
01773     m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D = m_playerA->getPlayerImpactPtsIn3DAllRallies();
01774 
01775     m_speedBData = m_playerB->getPlayerSpeedData(m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters);
01776     m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D = m_playerB->getPlayerImpactPtsIn3DAllRallies();
01777 
01778     std::cout<<"PlayerA speeddata size is:"<<m_speedAData.size()<<"\n";
01779     std::cout<<"PlayerA impct point size is:"<<m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.size()<<"\n";
01780 
01781     std::cout<<"PlayerB speeddata size is:"<<m_speedBData.size()<<"\n";
01782     std::cout<<"PlayerB impct point size is:"<<m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.size()<<"\n";
01783 
01784     calculateFieldOfPlayInWorldCoords();
01785 
01786     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
01787 
01788     prim->createSphere("sphere",0.08,10.0);
01789 
01790     // scaled by 10 as the speedmap view's scale is
01791     // 1 unit = 0.1 meter
01792     prim->createTrianglePlane("speedPlane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld*10.0,m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10.0,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
01793 
01794     m_speedMapBuilt = true;
01795 
01796 
01797 
01798 }
01799 
01800 void StatsVisualization::calculateFieldOfPlayInWorldCoords()
01801 {
01802     // have to set 0.70 to 1.0 and check if scaling issue gets resolved
01803     // and set it to depth paramter if something other than 1
01804 
01805     float fieldOfPlayXWorld = (m_fieldOfPlay.x/640 - 0.5) * m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters * 1.111467f;
01806     float fieldOfPlayYWorld = (0.5 - m_fieldOfPlay.y/480) * m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters * 0.833599f;
01807 
01808     float fieldOfPlayDownY = m_fieldOfPlay.y + m_fieldOfPlay.height;
01809     float fieldOfPlayDownYWorld = (0.5 - fieldOfPlayDownY/480) * m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters * 0.833599f;
01810 
01811     float fieldOfPlayExtremeLeftX = m_fieldOfPlay.x + m_fieldOfPlay.width;
01812     float fieldOfPlayExtremeLeftXWorld = (fieldOfPlayExtremeLeftX/640 - 0.5) * m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters * 1.111467f;
01813 
01814     m_finalCourtWidthWorld = fabs(fieldOfPlayExtremeLeftXWorld - fieldOfPlayXWorld);
01815     m_finalCourtDepthWorld = fabs(fieldOfPlayDownYWorld - fieldOfPlayYWorld);
01816 }
01817 
01818 void StatsVisualization::setColorBasedOnSpeedRange(float _inputVelocity)
01819 {
01820     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
01821     (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01822 
01823     if(_inputVelocity >= 0.0 && _inputVelocity < 0.3)
01824     {
01825        shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.8,1.0);
01826     }
01827     else if(_inputVelocity >= 0.3 && _inputVelocity < 0.6)
01828     {
01829        shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",1.0,1.0,0.0);
01830     }
01831     else if(_inputVelocity >= 0.6)
01832     {
01833        shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",1.0,0.5,0.0);
01834     }
01835 }
01836 
01837 void StatsVisualization::buildRPMData()
01838 {
01839     m_playerARPM = m_playerA->getRevolutionsPerMinute(m_diameterOfBAllInMeters,m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters);
01840     m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D = m_playerA->getPlayerImpactPtsIn3DAllRallies();
01841 
01842     m_playerBRPM = m_playerB->getRevolutionsPerMinute(m_diameterOfBAllInMeters,m_kinectToPlayAreaInMeters);
01843     m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D = m_playerB->getPlayerImpactPtsIn3DAllRallies();
01844 
01845     std::cout<<"PlayerA rpmdata size is:"<<m_playerARPM.size()<<"\n";
01846     std::cout<<"PlayerA impct point size is:"<<m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.size()<<"\n";
01847 
01848     std::cout<<"PlayerB rpmdata size is:"<<m_playerBRPM.size()<<"\n";
01849     std::cout<<"PlayerB impct point size is:"<<m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.size()<<"\n";
01850 
01851     calculateFieldOfPlayInWorldCoords();
01852 
01853     // currently creating balls again which will be rendered color coded
01854     // based on the rpm value
01855 
01856     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
01857 
01858     prim->createSphere("rpmSphere",0.08,10.0);
01859 
01860     // scaled by 10 as the speedmap view's scale is
01861     // 1 unit = 0.1 meter
01862     prim->createTrianglePlane("rpmPlane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld*10.0,m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10.0,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
01863 
01864     m_rpmDataBuilt = true;
01865 
01866 
01867 }
01868 
01869 void StatsVisualization::setColorBasedOnRPMRange(float _inputRPM)
01870 {
01871     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
01872     (*shader)["PerFragADS"]->use();
01873 
01874     if(_inputRPM >= 0 && _inputRPM < 100)
01875     {
01876        shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",0.0,0.8,1.0);
01877     }
01878     else if(_inputRPM >= 100 && _inputRPM < 200)
01879     {
01880        shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",1.0,1.0,0.0);
01881     }
01882     else if(_inputRPM >= 200)
01883     {
01884        shader->setShaderParam3f("material.Kd",1.0,0.5,0.0);
01885     }
01886 }
01887 
01888 void StatsVisualization::fillDataVertsWithNormals(std::vector<cv::Point3f>& _inputVertList,
01889                                                   std::vector<VertData>& o_normalFilledDataVerts)
01890 {
01891     // we scale it down only by 10 and not by 20 as tri plane is drawn from 0,0,0
01892     // so it will stretch from 10 untis up to 10 units down
01893     // similarly for width as well from left to right
01894     int cubeIndex = 0;
01895     VertData d;
01896 
01897     // for every cube
01898     for(int i=0;i<_inputVertList.size();i=i+8)
01899     {
01900         //for every face in the cube - 6 vertices per face (2 triangle per face)
01901         for(int j=0;j<sizeof(indices)/sizeof(indices[0]);j=j+6)// size of indices = 36
01902         {
01903             // GUNDU FACE
01904 
01905             //triangle 1, v1
01906             d.x = _inputVertList[indices[j]+i].x;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_x;
01907             d.y = _inputVertList[indices[j]+i].y;//- _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_y;
01908             d.z = _inputVertList[indices[j]+i].z;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_z;
01909 
01910             d.nx = normals[j/6].m_x;
01911             d.ny = normals[j/6].m_y;
01912             d.nz = normals[j/6].m_z;
01913             o_normalFilledDataVerts.push_back(d);
01914 
01915             //triangle 1, v2
01916             d.x = _inputVertList[indices[j+1]+i].x;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_x;
01917             d.y = _inputVertList[indices[j+1]+i].y;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_y;
01918             d.z = _inputVertList[indices[j+1]+i].z;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_z;
01919 
01920             d.nx = normals[j/6].m_x;
01921             d.ny = normals[j/6].m_y;
01922             d.nz = normals[j/6].m_z;
01923             o_normalFilledDataVerts.push_back(d);
01924 
01925             //triangle 1, v3
01926             d.x = _inputVertList[indices[j+2]+i].x;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_x;
01927             d.y = _inputVertList[indices[j+2]+i].y;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_y;
01928             d.z = _inputVertList[indices[j+2]+i].z;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_z;
01929 
01930             d.nx = normals[j/6].m_x;
01931             d.ny = normals[j/6].m_y;
01932             d.nz = normals[j/6].m_z;
01933             o_normalFilledDataVerts.push_back(d);
01934 
01935             //triangle 2, v1
01936             d.x = _inputVertList[indices[j+3]+i].x;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_x;
01937             d.y = _inputVertList[indices[j+3]+i].y;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_y;
01938             d.z = _inputVertList[indices[j+3]+i].z;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_z;
01939 
01940             d.nx = normals[j/6].m_x;
01941             d.ny = normals[j/6].m_y;
01942             d.nz = normals[j/6].m_z;
01943             o_normalFilledDataVerts.push_back(d);
01944 
01945             //triangle 2, v2
01946             d.x = _inputVertList[indices[j+4]+i].x;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_x;
01947             d.y = _inputVertList[indices[j+4]+i].y;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_y;
01948             d.z = _inputVertList[indices[j+4]+i].z;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_z;
01949 
01950             d.nx = normals[j/6].m_x;
01951             d.ny = normals[j/6].m_y;
01952             d.nz = normals[j/6].m_z;
01953             o_normalFilledDataVerts.push_back(d);
01954 
01955             //triangle 2, v3
01956             d.x = _inputVertList[indices[j+5]+i].x;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_x;
01957             d.y = _inputVertList[indices[j+5]+i].y;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_y;
01958             d.z = _inputVertList[indices[j+5]+i].z;// - _gapFactor*normals[j/6].m_z;
01959 
01960             d.nx = normals[j/6].m_x;
01961             d.ny = normals[j/6].m_y;
01962             d.nz = normals[j/6].m_z;
01963 
01964             o_normalFilledDataVerts.push_back(d);
01965         }
01966         cubeIndex++;
01967     }
01968 }
01969 
01970 void StatsVisualization::readFile(QString _inputFileName)
01971 {
01972     if(_inputFileName.isEmpty())
01973     {
01974         std::cout<<"Filename empty. Returning. Read Aborted\n";
01975         return;
01976     }
01977     //read
01978     std::cout <<"Reading: "<<"\n";
01979 
01980     cv::FileStorage fs;
01981     fs.open(_inputFileName.toStdString(), cv::FileStorage::READ);
01982 
01983 
01984     fillDataFromFileForBothPlayers(fs,PLAYERA);
01985     fillDataFromFileForBothPlayers(fs,PLAYERB);
01986 
01987     cv::FileNode n8 = fs["FieldOfPlay"];
01988     cv::FileNodeIterator it8 = n8.begin();
01989     m_fieldOfPlay.x = (int)*it8;
01990     m_fieldOfPlay.y = (int)*(++it8);
01991     m_fieldOfPlay.width = (int)*(++it8);
01992     m_fieldOfPlay.height = (int)*(++it8);
01993 
01994     m_finalCourtWidthWorld = (float)fs["CourtWidth"];
01995     m_finalCourtDepthWorld = (float)fs["CourtDepth"];
01996     m_width = (int)fs["Width"];
01997     m_height = (int)fs["Height"];
01998     m_midTopX = (int)fs["MidTopX"];
01999     m_midTopY = (int)fs["MidTopY"];
02000     m_midBottomX = (int)fs["MidBottomX"];
02001     m_midBottomY = (int)fs["MidBottomY"];
02002     m_midLeftX = (int)fs["MidLeftX"];
02003     m_midLeftY = (int)fs["MidLeftY"];
02004     m_midRightX = (int)fs["MidRightX"];
02005     m_midRightY = (int)fs["MidRightY"];
02006 
02007     m_quadMapBuilt = true;
02008     m_speedMapBuilt = true;
02009     m_rpmDataBuilt = true;
02010     m_trajectoryBuilt = true;
02011     m_impactPtsFilled = true;
02012 
02013     //Generating our rendering stuff
02014 
02015     // create a vao as a series of GL_TRIANGLES
02016     m_vao= ngl::VertexArrayObject::createVOA(GL_TRIANGLES);
02017 
02018     // we will create separate planes and spheres for various statistics instead of
02019     // trying to scale them each time as we have different units of scaling and
02020     // those scale factors are calculated at various times
02021     // and this is much easier than that even though it takes quite a bit of memory
02022 
02023     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
02024     prim->createTrianglePlane("heightMapPlane",m_fieldOfPlay.width/10.0,m_fieldOfPlay.height/10.0,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02025     prim->createTrianglePlane("trajectoryPlane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld,m_finalCourtDepthWorld,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02026     prim->createSphere("trajectorySphere",0.004,10.0);
02027     prim->createSphere("sphere",0.08,10.0);
02028     prim->createTrianglePlane("speedPlane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld*10.0,m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10.0,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02029     prim->createSphere("rpmSphere",0.08,10.0);
02030     prim->createTrianglePlane("rpmPlane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld*10.0,m_finalCourtDepthWorld*10.0,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02031 
02032     updateGL();
02033 
02034 }
02035 
02036 // recieve file name input from UI
02037 void StatsVisualization::writeFile()
02038 {
02039 
02040     QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, "Save File","archive"," Xml File (*.xml)");
02041 
02042 
02043     // check if filename is valid, if so call read
02044     if(fileName.isEmpty())
02045     {
02046         std::cout<<"File name empty. Write aborted.\n";
02047         return;
02048     }
02049 
02050     cv::FileStorage fs(fileName.toStdString(), cv::FileStorage::WRITE);
02051 
02052     // we build all the data if not already present in the respective buffers
02053     // this might take quite a while as all data are captured in buffers
02054     // sequentially
02055     if(!(m_impactPtsFilled))
02056     {
02057         fillAllImpactPointsBothPlayers();
02058     }
02059 
02060     if(!(m_quadMapBuilt))
02061     {
02062         buildQuadSpecificData();
02063     }
02064 
02065     if(!(m_vao))
02066     {
02067         buildPointGraphBars();
02068     }
02069 
02070     if(!(m_trajectoryBuilt))
02071     {
02072         buildTrajectory();
02073     }
02074 
02075     if(!(m_speedMapBuilt))
02076     {
02077         buildSpeedMap();
02078     }
02079 
02080     if(!(m_rpmDataBuilt))
02081     {
02082         buildRPMData();
02083     }
02084 
02085     // Data corresponding to both the players written out to xml
02086     // Also, common data such as field of play width etc are written out to xml
02087 
02088     // PLAYERA data
02089 
02090     fs << "PLAYERA";
02091     fs<< "{";
02092 
02093     fs<< "ImpactData"<<m_playerAImpactData;
02094 
02095     fs<< "QuadSpecBL"<<m_quadSpecABL;
02096 
02097     fs<< "QuadSpecTL"<<m_quadSpecATL;
02098 
02099     fs<< "QuadSpecTR"<<m_quadSpecATR;
02100 
02101     fs<< "QuadSpecBR"<<m_quadSpecABR;
02102 
02103     fs<< "PercentageBL"<< m_percentageABL;
02104 
02105     fs<< "PercentageTL"<< m_percentageATL;
02106 
02107     fs<< "PercentageTR"<< m_percentageATR;
02108 
02109     fs<< "PercentageBR"<< m_percentageABR;
02110 
02111     fs<< "InterpPtsMappedToRallies"<< m_playerAInterpPtsMappedToRallies;
02112 
02113     fs<< "CubeDataVertices"<<"[";
02114     for(int i=0;i<m_dataVertsA.size();i++)
02115     {
02116         fs<< m_dataVertsA[i].nx;
02117         fs<< m_dataVertsA[i].ny;
02118         fs<< m_dataVertsA[i].nz;
02119         fs<< m_dataVertsA[i].x;
02120         fs<< m_dataVertsA[i].y;
02121         fs<< m_dataVertsA[i].z;
02122     }
02123     fs<< "]";
02124 
02125     fs<< "SpeedData"<<m_speedAData;
02126 
02127     fs<< "PlayerImpactPointsIn3D"<<m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D;
02128 
02129     fs<< "RPMData"<<m_playerARPM;
02130 
02131     fs<< "}";
02132 
02133 
02134     //PLAYERB data
02135 
02136     fs<< "PLAYERB";
02137     fs<< "{";
02138 
02139     fs<< "ImpactData"<<m_playerBImpactData;
02140 
02141     fs<< "QuadSpecBL"<<m_quadSpecBBL;
02142 
02143     fs<< "QuadSpecTL"<<m_quadSpecBTL;
02144 
02145     fs<< "QuadSpecTR"<<m_quadSpecBTR;
02146 
02147     fs<< "QuadSpecBR"<<m_quadSpecBBR;
02148 
02149     fs<< "PercentageBL"<< m_percentageBBL;
02150 
02151     fs<< "PercentageTL"<< m_percentageBTL;
02152 
02153     fs<< "PercentageTR"<< m_percentageBTR;
02154 
02155     fs<< "PercentageBR"<< m_percentageBBR;
02156 
02157     fs<< "InterpPtsMappedToRallies"<< m_playerBInterpPtsMappedToRallies;
02158 
02159     fs<< "CubeDataVertices"<<"[";
02160     for(int i=0;i<m_dataVertsB.size();i++)
02161     {
02162         fs<< m_dataVertsB[i].nx;
02163         fs<< m_dataVertsB[i].ny;
02164         fs<< m_dataVertsB[i].nz;
02165         fs<< m_dataVertsB[i].x;
02166         fs<< m_dataVertsB[i].y;
02167         fs<< m_dataVertsB[i].z;
02168     }
02169     fs<< "]";
02170 
02171     fs<< "SpeedData"<<m_speedBData;
02172 
02173     fs<< "PlayerImpactPointsIn3D"<<m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D;
02174 
02175     fs<< "RPMData"<<m_playerBRPM;
02176 
02177     fs<< "}";
02178 
02179 
02180     fs<<"FieldOfPlay"<<"["<<m_fieldOfPlay.x<<m_fieldOfPlay.y<<m_fieldOfPlay.width<<m_fieldOfPlay.height<<"]";
02181     fs<<"CourtWidth"<<m_finalCourtWidthWorld;
02182     fs<<"CourtDepth"<<m_finalCourtDepthWorld;
02183     fs<<"Width"<<m_width;
02184     fs<<"Height"<<m_height;
02185     fs<<"MidTopX"<<m_midTopX;
02186     fs<<"MidTopY"<<m_midTopY;
02187     fs<<"MidBottomX"<<m_midBottomX;
02188     fs<<"MidBottomY"<<m_midBottomY;
02189     fs<<"MidLeftX"<<m_midLeftX;
02190     fs<<"MidLeftY"<<m_midLeftY;
02191     fs<<"MidRightX"<<m_midRightX;
02192     fs<<"MidRightY"<<m_midRightY;
02193 
02194     fs.release();                                       // explicit close
02195 
02196     std::cout << "Write Done.\n";
02197 
02198 
02199 }
02200 
02201 
02202 void StatsVisualization::fillDataFromFileForBothPlayers(cv::FileStorage& _fs,WHOSE_STATS _whichPlayer)
02203 {
02204     std::string whichPlayerString;
02205 
02206     if(_whichPlayer == PLAYERA)
02207     {
02208         whichPlayerString = "PLAYERA";
02209     }
02210     else
02211     {
02212         whichPlayerString = "PLAYERB";
02213     }
02214 
02215     cv::FileNode n1 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["ImpactData"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02216     if (n1.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02217     {
02218         std::cout << "Impact pt is not a sequence\n";
02219     }
02220 
02221     cv::FileNodeIterator it1 = n1.begin(), it1_end = n1.end(); // Go through the node
02222     for (; it1 != it1_end; ++it1++)
02223     {
02224         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02225         {
02226             this->m_playerAImpactData.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it1,(float)*(++it1)));
02227         }
02228         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02229         {
02230             this->m_playerBImpactData.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it1,(float)*(++it1)));
02231         }
02232     }
02233 
02234 
02235 
02236     cv::FileNode n2 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["QuadSpecBL"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02237     if (n2.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02238     {
02239         std::cout << "ABL is not a sequence\n";
02240     }
02241 
02242     cv::FileNodeIterator it2 = n2.begin(), it2_end = n2.end(); // Go through the node
02243     for (; it2 != it2_end; ++it2++)
02244     {
02245         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02246         {
02247             this->m_quadSpecABL.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it2,(float)*(++it2)));
02248         }
02249         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02250         {
02251             this->m_quadSpecBBL.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it2,(float)*(++it2)));
02252         }
02253     }
02254 
02255 
02256     cv::FileNode n3 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["QuadSpecTL"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02257     if (n3.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02258     {
02259         std::cout << "ATL is not a sequence\n";
02260     }
02261 
02262     cv::FileNodeIterator it3 = n3.begin(), it3_end = n3.end(); // Go through the node
02263     for (; it3 != it3_end; ++it3++)
02264     {
02265         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02266         {
02267             this->m_quadSpecATL.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it3,(float)*(++it3)));
02268         }
02269         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02270         {
02271             this->m_quadSpecBTL.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it3,(float)*(++it3)));
02272         }
02273     }
02274 
02275 
02276     cv::FileNode n4 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["QuadSpecTR"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02277     if (n4.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02278     {
02279         std::cout << "ATR is not a sequence!\n";
02280     }
02281 
02282     cv::FileNodeIterator it4 = n4.begin(), it4_end = n4.end(); // Go through the node
02283     for (; it4 != it4_end; ++it4++)
02284     {
02285         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02286         {
02287             this->m_quadSpecATR.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it4,(float)*(++it4)));
02288         }
02289         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02290         {
02291             this->m_quadSpecBTR.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it4,(float)*(++it4)));
02292         }
02293     }
02294 
02295     cv::FileNode n5 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["QuadSpecBR"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02296     if (n5.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02297     {
02298         std::cout << "ABR not a sequence!\n";
02299     }
02300 
02301     cv::FileNodeIterator it5 = n5.begin(), it5_end = n5.end(); // Go through the node
02302     for (; it5 != it5_end; ++it5++)
02303     {
02304         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02305         {
02306             this->m_quadSpecABR.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it5,(float)*(++it5)));
02307         }
02308         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02309         {
02310             this->m_quadSpecBBR.push_back(cv::Point2f((float)*it5,(float)*(++it5)));
02311         }
02312     }
02313 
02314 
02315     if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02316     {
02317         this->m_percentageABL = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageBL"];
02318         this->m_percentageATL = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageTL"];
02319         this->m_percentageATR = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageTR"];
02320         this->m_percentageABR = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageBR"];
02321     }
02322     else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02323     {
02324         this->m_percentageBBL = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageBL"];
02325         this->m_percentageBTL = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageTL"];
02326         this->m_percentageBTR = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageTR"];
02327         this->m_percentageBBR = (float)_fs[whichPlayerString]["PercentageBR"];
02328     }
02329 
02330 
02331 
02332     cv::FileNode trajectoryNode = _fs[whichPlayerString]["InterpPtsMappedToRallies"];  // Read string sequence - Get node
02333     if (trajectoryNode.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02334     {
02335         std::cout << "Trajectory node not a sequence!\n";
02336     }
02337 
02338     cv::FileNodeIterator trajectoryNodeit = trajectoryNode.begin(), trajectoryNodeit_end = trajectoryNode.end(); // Go through the node
02339     for (; trajectoryNodeit != trajectoryNodeit_end; ++trajectoryNodeit)
02340     {
02341         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02342         {
02343             this->m_playerATrajectoryFromFile.push_back((float)*trajectoryNodeit);
02344         }
02345         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02346         {
02347             this->m_playerBTrajectoryFromFile.push_back((float)*trajectoryNodeit);
02348         }
02349     }
02350 
02351 
02352     cv::FileNode htMapNode = _fs[whichPlayerString]["CubeDataVertices"];  // Read string sequence - Get node
02353     if (htMapNode.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02354     {
02355         std::cout << "HtMap node not a sequence!\n";
02356     }
02357 
02358     cv::FileNodeIterator htMapNodeit = htMapNode.begin(), htMapNodeit_end = htMapNode.end(); // Go through the node
02359     for (; htMapNodeit != htMapNodeit_end; ++htMapNodeit)
02360     {
02361         VertData tempData;
02362         tempData.nx = (float)*(htMapNodeit);
02363         tempData.ny = (float)*(++htMapNodeit);
02364         tempData.nz = (float)*(++htMapNodeit);
02365 
02366         tempData.x = (float)*(++htMapNodeit);
02367         tempData.y = (float)*(++htMapNodeit);
02368         tempData.z = (float)*(++htMapNodeit);
02369 
02370         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02371         {
02372             this->m_dataVertsA.push_back(tempData);
02373         }
02374         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02375         {
02376             this->m_dataVertsB.push_back(tempData);
02377         }
02378     }
02379 
02380 
02381     cv::FileNode n6 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["SpeedData"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02382     if (n6.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02383     {
02384         std::cout << "SpeedData not a sequence!\n";
02385     }
02386 
02387     cv::FileNodeIterator it6 = n6.begin(), it6_end = n6.end(); // Go through the node
02388     for (; it6 != it6_end; ++it6)
02389     {
02390         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02391         {
02392             this->m_speedAData.push_back((float)*it6);
02393         }
02394         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02395         {
02396             this->m_speedBData.push_back((float)*it6);
02397         }
02398     }
02399 
02400 
02401     cv::FileNode impactPt3DNode = _fs[whichPlayerString]["PlayerImpactPointsIn3D"];  // Read string sequence - Get node
02402     if (impactPt3DNode.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02403     {
02404         std::cout << "PlayerImpactPointsIn3D node not a sequence!\n";
02405     }
02406 
02407     cv::FileNodeIterator impactPt3DNodeit = impactPt3DNode.begin(), impactPt3DNodeit_end = impactPt3DNode.end(); // Go through the node
02408     for (; impactPt3DNodeit != impactPt3DNodeit_end; ++impactPt3DNodeit)
02409     {
02410         cv::Point3f tempPoint3D((float)*(impactPt3DNodeit), (float)*(++impactPt3DNodeit), (float)*(++impactPt3DNodeit));
02411 
02412         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02413         {
02414             this->m_playerAImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.push_back(tempPoint3D);
02415         }
02416         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02417         {
02418             this->m_playerBImpactPtsAllRalliesIn3D.push_back(tempPoint3D);
02419         }
02420     }
02421 
02422 
02423     cv::FileNode n7 = _fs[whichPlayerString]["RPMData"];                         // Read string sequence - Get node
02424     if (n7.type() != cv::FileNode::SEQ)
02425     {
02426         std::cout << "RPMData not a sequence!\n";
02427     }
02428 
02429     cv::FileNodeIterator it7 = n7.begin(), it7_end = n7.end(); // Go through the node
02430     for (; it7 != it7_end; ++it7)
02431     {
02432         if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERA")
02433         {
02434             this->m_playerARPM.push_back((float)*it7);
02435         }
02436         else if(whichPlayerString == "PLAYERB")
02437         {
02438             this->m_playerBRPM.push_back((float)*it7);
02439         }
02440 
02441     }
02442 }
02443 
02444 void StatsVisualization::drawCrowd(const std::string& _inputPlaneName)
02445 {
02446 
02447     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
02448     (*shader)["TextureShaderStats"]->use();
02449     // need to bind the active texture before drawing
02450     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,m_crowdTextureName);
02451     //glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL);
02452 
02453     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
02454 
02455     ngl::Real positionX,positionZ;
02456     positionX = positionZ = 0.0;
02457 
02458     if(_inputPlaneName == "heightMapPlane")
02459     {
02460         positionX = (m_fieldOfPlay.width/2);// + 300.0;
02461         positionZ = (m_fieldOfPlay.width/2) - 10; //285.0;
02462     }
02463     else if(_inputPlaneName == "trajectoryPlane")
02464     {
02465         positionX = m_finalCourtWidthWorld + 3.0;
02466         positionZ = m_finalCourtWidthWorld + 3.0;
02467     }
02468     else if((_inputPlaneName == "speedPlane") || (_inputPlaneName == "rpmPlane"))
02469     {
02470         positionX = (m_finalCourtWidthWorld * 10) + 30.0;
02471         positionZ = (m_finalCourtWidthWorld * 10) + 30.0;
02472     }
02473     // rt
02474     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02475     {
02476         m_transformStack.setScale(10,10,10);
02477         m_transformStack.setRotation(0,90,90);
02478         m_transformStack.setPosition(positionX,0,0);
02479 
02480         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02481         prim->draw(_inputPlaneName);
02482     }
02483     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02484 
02485 
02486 
02487     // lt
02488     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02489     {
02490         m_transformStack.setScale(10,10,10);
02491         m_transformStack.setRotation(0,90,90);
02492         m_transformStack.setPosition(-(positionX),0,0);
02493 
02494 
02495         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02496         prim->draw(_inputPlaneName);
02497     }
02498     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02499 
02500 
02501 
02502     // far
02503     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02504     {
02505         m_transformStack.setScale(10,10,10);
02506         m_transformStack.setRotation(-90,0,0);
02507         m_transformStack.setPosition(0,0,positionZ);
02508 
02509 
02510         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02511         prim->draw(_inputPlaneName);
02512     }
02513     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02514 
02515 
02516 
02517     // back
02518     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02519     {
02520         m_transformStack.setScale(10,10,10);
02521         m_transformStack.setRotation(-90,0,0);
02522         m_transformStack.setPosition(0,0,-(positionZ));
02523 
02524 
02525         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02526         prim->draw(_inputPlaneName);
02527     }
02528     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02529 
02530 
02531 
02532 }

02534 void StatsVisualization::drawTable(const std::string& _inputTableName)
02535 {
02536     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
02537     (*shader)["TextureShaderStats"]->use();
02538     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
02539 
02540     ngl::Real positionY = 0.0;
02541 
02542     if((_inputTableName == "speedPlane") || (_inputTableName == "rpmPlane"))
02543     {
02544         positionY = -0.08;
02545     }
02546     else
02547     {
02548         positionY = 0.0;
02549     }
02550     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02551     {
02552         m_transformStack.setPosition(0,positionY,0);
02553         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,m_tableTextureName);
02554         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02555         prim->draw(_inputTableName);
02556     }
02557     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02558 
02559 }

02561 void StatsVisualization::drawContainingGridScaleXY()
02562 {
02563     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
02564     (*shader)["TextureShaderStats"]->use();
02565     // need to bind the active texture before drawing
02566     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,m_gridXYHtMap);
02567     //glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL);
02568 
02569     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim = ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
02570     ngl::Real positionX,positionZ,positionY;
02571     positionX = positionZ = positionY = 0;
02572 
02573     // we will create separate planes and spheres for various statistics instead of
02574     // trying to scale them each time as we have different units of scaling and
02575     // those scale factors are calculated at various times
02576     // and this is much easier than that even though it takes quite a bit of memory
02577     if(m_whichStat == IMPACT_HEIGHT_MAP_VIEW)
02578     {
02579         prim->createTrianglePlane("xygridrtplane",m_fieldOfPlay.height/10.0,20,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02580         prim->createTrianglePlane("xygridfarplane",m_fieldOfPlay.width/10.0,20,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02581         positionX = -(m_fieldOfPlay.width/20.0);
02582         positionY = 10;
02583         positionZ = -(m_fieldOfPlay.height/20.0);
02584     }
02585     else if(m_whichStat == TRAJECTORY_VIEW)
02586     {
02587         prim->createTrianglePlane("xygridrtplane",m_finalCourtDepthWorld,0.5,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02588         prim->createTrianglePlane("xygridfarplane",m_finalCourtWidthWorld,0.5,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02589         positionX = -(m_finalCourtWidthWorld/2.0);
02590         positionY = 0.25;
02591         positionZ = -(m_finalCourtDepthWorld/2.0);
02592     }
02593 
02594 
02595     // rt
02596     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02597     {
02598         //m_transformStack.setScale(m_fieldOfPlay.width,20,0);
02599         m_transformStack.setRotation(0,90,-270);
02600         m_transformStack.setPosition(positionX,positionY,0);
02601         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02602         prim->draw("xygridrtplane");
02603 
02604     }
02605     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02606 
02607 
02608 
02609     // far
02610     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02611     {
02612         //m_transformStack.setScale(m_fieldOfPlay.width,20,0);
02613         m_transformStack.setRotation(-90,0,0);
02614         m_transformStack.setPosition(0,positionY,positionZ);
02615         loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02616         prim->draw("xygridfarplane");
02617 
02618     }
02619     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02620 
02621 
02622 }

02624 void StatsVisualization::renderPercentages()
02625 {
02626 
02627     QString text;
02628 
02629     float bottomLeftPosX = m_midTopX - (m_fieldOfPlay.width/4);
02630     float bottomLeftPosY = m_midTopY + (m_fieldOfPlay.height/2);
02631 
02632     float topLeftPosX = m_midTopX - (m_fieldOfPlay.width/4);
02633     float topLeftPosY = m_midTopY + (m_fieldOfPlay.height/4);
02634 
02635     float topRightPosX = m_midTopX + (m_fieldOfPlay.width/8);
02636     float topRightPosY = m_midTopY + (m_fieldOfPlay.height/4);
02637 
02638     float bottomRightPosX = m_midTopX + (m_fieldOfPlay.width/8);
02639     float bottomRightPosY = m_midTopY + (m_fieldOfPlay.height/2);
02640 
02641     //m_text->setScreenSize(640,480);
02642 
02643     switch(m_whichStat)
02644     {
02645         case IMPACT_PERCENTAGE_DISTRIBUTION_VIEW:
02646         {
02647             switch(m_whichPlayer)
02648             {
02649                 case PLAYERA:
02650                 {
02651                     m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02652                     switch(m_whichQuad)
02653                     {
02654                         case BOTTOM_LEFT:
02655                         {
02656                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageABL);
02657                             m_text->renderText(bottomLeftPosX,bottomLeftPosY,text);//bl
02658                             break;
02659                         }
02660                         case TOP_LEFT:
02661                         {
02662                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageATL);
02663                             m_text->renderText(topLeftPosX,topLeftPosY,text);//tl
02664                             break;
02665                         }
02666                         case TOP_RIGHT:
02667                         {
02668                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageATR);
02669                             m_text->renderText(topRightPosX,topRightPosY,text);//tr
02670                             break;
02671                         }
02672                         case BOTTOM_RIGHT:
02673                         {
02674                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageABR);
02675                             m_text->renderText(bottomRightPosX,bottomRightPosY,text);//br
02676                             break;
02677                         }
02678                         case ALL:
02679                         {
02680                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageABL);
02681                             m_text->renderText(bottomLeftPosX,bottomLeftPosY,text);//bl
02682 
02683                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageATL);
02684                             m_text->renderText(topLeftPosX,topLeftPosY,text);//tl
02685

02687                             m_text->renderText(topRightPosX,topRightPosY,text);//tr
02688 
02689                             text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageABR);
02690                             m_text->renderText(bottomRightPosX,bottomRightPosY,text);//br
02691 
02692                             break;
02693                         }
02694 
02695                     }
02696                     break;
02697                 }
02698 
02699             case PLAYERB:
02700             {
02701                 m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02702                 switch(m_whichQuad)
02703                 {
02704                     case BOTTOM_LEFT:
02705                     {
02706                         text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageBBL);

02720                         break;

02723                     {
02724                         text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageBBR);
02725                         m_text->renderText(bottomRightPosX,bottomRightPosY,text);//br
02726                         break;
02727                     }
02728                     case ALL:
02729                     {
02730                         text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageBBL);
02731                         m_text->renderText(bottomLeftPosX,bottomLeftPosY,text);//bl
02732 
02733                         text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageBTL);
02734                         m_text->renderText(topLeftPosX,topLeftPosY,text);//tl
02735 
02736                         text.sprintf("%3.2f %%",m_percentageBTR);

02746             }

02750                 {

02753                         m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02754                         text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageABL);
02755                         m_text->renderText(bottomLeftPosX - 80,bottomLeftPosY,text);//bl

02760                         break;

02767

02769                         text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBTL);

02771                         break;
02772                     }
02773                     case TOP_RIGHT:
02774                     {

02776                        text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageATR);
02777                        m_text->renderText(topRightPosX - 60,topRightPosY,text);//tr
02778 
02779                        m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02780                        text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBTR);
02781                        m_text->renderText(topRightPosX + 30,topRightPosY,text);//tr
02782 
02783                        break;
02784                     }
02785                     case BOTTOM_RIGHT:
02786                     {
02787                         m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02788                         text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageABR);
02789                         m_text->renderText(bottomRightPosX - 60,bottomRightPosY,text);//br
02790 
02791                         m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02792                         text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBBR);
02793                         m_text->renderText(bottomRightPosX + 30,bottomRightPosY,text);//br
02794                         break;
02795                     }
02796                     case ALL:
02797                     {
02798                         m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02799                         text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageABL);
02800                         m_text->renderText(bottomLeftPosX - 80,bottomLeftPosY,text);//bl
02801                         m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02802                         text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBBL);
02803                         m_text->renderText(bottomLeftPosX + 10,bottomLeftPosY,text);//bl
02804 
02805                         m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02806                         text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageATL);
02807                         m_text->renderText(topLeftPosX - 80,topLeftPosY,text);//tl
02808                         m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02809                         text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBTL);
02810                         m_text->renderText(topLeftPosX + 10,topLeftPosY,text);//tl
02811 
02812                         m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02813                         text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageATR);
02814                         m_text->renderText(topRightPosX - 60,topRightPosY,text);//tr
02815                         m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02816                         text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBTR);
02817                         m_text->renderText(topRightPosX + 30,topRightPosY,text);//tr
02818 
02819                         m_text->setColour(1,1,0);
02820                         text.sprintf("(%3.0f / ",m_percentageABR);
02821                         m_text->renderText(bottomRightPosX - 60,bottomRightPosY,text);//br
02822                         m_text->setColour(0,0,0);
02823                         text.sprintf("%3.0f)%%",m_percentageBBR);

02826                         break;
02827                     }
02828 
02829                 }
02830                 break;
02831             }
02832 
02833             }
02834             break;
02835         }
02836 
02837         default:
02838             break;
02839     }
02840 
02841     // this has to be done at the end to avoid 3d stats rendering in black
02842     // ngl text has something which makes other shaders work only when ngl
02843     // text color is set to white before using other shaders
02844     m_text->setColour(1,1,1);
02845 }

02847 //--------------------------------------------------
02848 /* ALL MOUSE EVENTS SHOULD ONLY WORK IN 3D....so place the parentvar check before processing any mouse events*/
02849 //--------------------------------------------------
02850 
02851 
02852 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02853 void StatsVisualization::mouseMoveEvent (
02854                                QMouseEvent * _event
02855                               )
02856 {
02857   // note the method buttons() is the button state when event was called
02858   // this is different from button() which is used to check which button was
02859   // pressed when the mousePress/Release event is generated
02860   if(m_rotate && _event->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton)
02861   {
02862     int diffx=_event->x()-m_origX;
02863     int diffy=_event->y()-m_origY;
02864     m_spinXFace += (float) 0.5f * diffy;
02865     m_spinYFace += (float) 0.5f * diffx;
02866     m_origX = _event->x();
02867     m_origY = _event->y();
02868     updateGL();
02869 
02870   }
02871   // right mouse translate code
02872   else if(m_translate && _event->buttons() == Qt::RightButton)
02873   {
02874     int diffX = (int)(_event->x() - m_origXPos);
02875     int diffY = (int)(_event->y() - m_origYPos);
02876     m_origXPos=_event->x();
02877     m_origYPos=_event->y();
02878     m_modelPos.m_x += INCREMENT * diffX;
02879     m_modelPos.m_y -= INCREMENT * diffY;
02880     updateGL();
02881 
02882   }
02883 
02884 }
02885 
02886 
02887 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02888 void StatsVisualization::mousePressEvent (
02889                                 QMouseEvent * _event
02890                                )
02891 {
02892   // this method is called when the mouse button is pressed in this case we
02893   // store the value where the maouse was clicked (x,y) and set the Rotate flag to true
02894   if(_event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
02895   {
02896     m_origX = _event->x();
02897     m_origY = _event->y();
02898     m_rotate =true;
02899   }
02900   // right mouse translate mode
02901   else if(_event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
02902   {
02903     m_origXPos = _event->x();
02904     m_origYPos = _event->y();
02905     m_translate=true;
02906   }
02907 
02908 }
02909 
02910 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02911 void StatsVisualization::mouseReleaseEvent (
02912                                   QMouseEvent * _event
02913                                  )
02914 {
02915   // this event is called when the mouse button is released
02916   // we then set Rotate to false
02917   if (_event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
02918   {
02919     m_rotate=false;
02920   }
02921   // right mouse translate mode
02922   if (_event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
02923   {
02924     m_translate=false;
02925   }
02926 }
02927 
02928 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02929 void StatsVisualization::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *_event)
02930 {
02931 
02932   // check the diff of the wheel position (0 means no change)
02933   if(_event->delta() > 0)
02934   {
02935     m_modelPos.m_z+=ZOOM;
02936   }
02937   else if(_event->delta() <0 )
02938   {
02939     m_modelPos.m_z-=ZOOM;
02940   }
02941   updateGL();
02942 }
02943 
02944 
02945 void StatsVisualization::legendWindow(GLuint _inputLegendName)
02946 {
02947     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
02948     (*shader)["TextureShaderStats"]->use();
02949     // need to bind the active texture before drawing
02950     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D,_inputLegendName);
02951 
02952     ngl::Transformation trans;
02953 
02954      // get the VBO instance and draw the built in teapot
02955     ngl::VAOPrimitives *prim=ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance();
02956 
02957     // we will create separate planes and spheres for various statistics instead of
02958     // trying to scale them each time as we have different units of scaling and
02959     // those scale factors are calculated at various times
02960     // and this is much easier than that even though it takes quite a bit of memory
02961     prim->createTrianglePlane("legendplane",0.8,0.8,1,1,ngl::Vec3(0,1,0));
02962 
02963     // first draw a top  persp // front //side
02964     ngl::Vec3 from(0,2,0);
02965     ngl::Vec3 to(0,0,0);
02966     ngl::Vec3 up(0,0,-1);
02968     m_transformStack.pushTransform();
02969     {
02970       from.set(0,0,2);
02971       up.set(0,1,0);
02972       m_view=ngl::lookAt(from,to,up);
02973       m_projection=ngl::ortho(-1,1,-1,1, 0.01f, 200.0f);
02974 
02975       glViewport(10,10,m_legendWidth,m_legendHeight);
02976       //m_2DScreen->draw();
02977 
02978       m_transformStack.setGlobal(trans);
02979       m_transformStack.setRotation(90,180,180);
02980       m_transformStack.setPosition(0,0,0);
02981       //m_transformStack.setScale(m_legendWidth,m_legendHeight,0);
02982       //loadMatricesToTextureShader();
02983       loadMatricesToLegendShader();
02984       prim->draw("legendplane");
02985 
02986     }
02987     m_transformStack.popTransform();
02988 
02989 }
02990 
02991 void StatsVisualization::loadMatricesToLegendShader()
02992 {
02993     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
02994     ngl::Mat4 MVP;
02995     ngl::Mat4 MV;
02996     ngl::Mat4 M;
02997     M=m_transformStack.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix();
02998     MV=  m_transformStack.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix()*m_view;
02999     MVP= M*m_view*m_projection;
03000     shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
03001     shader->setUniform("textureFlag",true);
03002 
03003 }
